tha-ap257:0.3_0: Hermits to the seven Drains, the senior monks.
tha-ap257:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap257:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap257:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piyans.
tha-ap257:5.1_0: The seventh portion of the senior monks is finished.
